comment.author: 14665672@N00
comment._content:
Ship was built and operated by the Danish company East Asiatic Company, or 
Det Østasiatiske Kompagni in Danish. The Selandia was operated by EAC until 1936, when it was sold. The ship was eventually wrecked off the Japanese coast in 1942.

comment.author: 35072786@N08
comment._content: peterhut:  Thanks for the information about who built this ship.  We will add some of it to the description when we update.
